name: Watching
description:
This is a Sinatra app that is a movie watchlist using the tmdb-api gem.
(Warning: may take a while to load.)

name: Start
description: Personal new tab page with keyboard navigation, bookmarks, weather, quotes, most recently listened to song, unread emails, and a random image background.

name: Résumé
description: This is my résumé! It's made into a website with harp, tachyons-sass, tachyons-print, and some magic!

name: Barcoded
description: This website is a simple barcode generator, used for DPCIs, backroom locations, cart labels, or whatever you may need!

name: Weatha
description: Simple weather app built with NPM, Gulp, CoffeeScript, Pug, and Sass. The weather information comes from Dark Sky, weather icons are Skycons, also from Dark Sky.

name: Watchlist
description: My girlfriend and I made a list of movies we have and would like to watch! It's made into a website with the Harp web server, The Movie Database and some magic!

name: Drinking Games
description: A collection of drinking games, based on certain TV shows. It's made into a website with [Nanoc](https://nanoc.ws/), a static site generator written in Ruby.

name: Iconic
description: A one-stop shop for easy copy/pasting of all the HTML needed for using icon fonts in your webpages. Just click, and bam! Right in your clipboard.
